
set(GTEST_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
set(GTEST_LIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/libgtest.so CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

set(GMOCK_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
set(GMOCK_LIB ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/libgmock.so CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
